Articles.Content:
Hover mouse over text box and this tooltip pops up (at least for me, using Chrome)

    heuristic type: UNKNOWN_TYPE    server type: NO_SERVER_DATA    field signature: 4290505990    form signature: 12655606563469690550    experiment id:

What is it doing there? Never used to be there.. if I'm unlucky, it can block view of what I'm writing.
I'm not seeing the same behavior on Chrome. Which text boxes specifically do you see it with?
That's odd, I can't seem to reproduce it on my end. Have you tried clearing your browser's cache?

ObsessedwithKSP, you need to fix your browser, this issue is nothing to do with the KSP forums.

[\[Link to Chrome issue\]](https://github.com/jzaefferer/jquery-validation/issues/243)

[\[same thing in Opera\]](http://forums.opera.com/discussion/1861676/how-to-disable-the-heurestic-type-and-other-information-displayed-on-text-inputs/p1)

This is specifically caused by the browser flag "#show-autofill-type-predictions".

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-13T13:37:26Z" title="05/13/2015 01:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 13, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**

Yep, and Chrome is up to date (just checked).

EDIT: Ahh, that'll be it. I haven't seen it anywhere else, which is why I thought it was the forums playing with me. Cheers for the link.

And it's fixed. Muchas gracias ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-13T13:39:05Z" title="05/13/2015 01:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 13, 2015</time> by ObsessedWithKSP**
